books.title: The Midnight Library
books.author: Matt Haig
books.description: Between life and death there is a library filled with books containing different versions of your life. When Nora Seeds finds herself in the Midnight Library, she has a chance to make different choices and discover what makes life worth living.

books.title: Project Hail Mary
books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: A lone astronaut must save the earth from disaster in this incredible adventure of ingenuity, discovery, and survival in space as only Andy Weir could imagine it.

books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.description: A woman shoots her husband five times and then never speaks another word. A criminal psychotherapist is determined to get her to talk and unravel the mystery of why she shot her apparently perfect husband.

books.title: Klara and the Sun
books.author: Kazuo Ishiguro
books.description: A story told from the perspective of an Artificial Friend, a solar-powered robot with human-like qualities who observes the world from her place in a store, waiting to be chosen by a customer.

books.title: The House in the Cerulean Sea
books.author: TJ Klune
books.description: A magical island where six dangerous magical children are being hidden away from the world. A social worker is sent to evaluate them and their caretaker, only to discover they may be humanity's last hope.

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: A groundbreaking narrative that explores how humans evolved from insignificant apes to become the dominant species on the planet, capable of splitting atoms, flying to the moon, and manipulating the genetic code of life.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.description: An easy and proven way to build good habits and break bad ones. This practical guide reveals a framework for daily improvement, no matter your goals, with tiny changes that yield remarkable results.

books.title: Entangled Life
books.author: Merlin Sheldrake
books.description: A mind-bending journey into the hidden world of fungi that will change your understanding of life on earth. Fungi provide a key to understanding the planet on which we live and the ways we think, feel, and behave.

books.title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
books.author: Daniel Kahneman
books.description: A revelatory exploration of how we make decisions, drawing on decades of research in psychology and behavioral economics. Kahneman explains the two systems that drive the way we think and make choices.

books.title: The Splendid and the Vile
books.author: Erik Larson
books.description: A compelling portrait of Winston Churchill's leadership during the Blitz, showing how Churchill taught the British people to be fearless and how he transformed their fear into courage in one of history's darkest years.

attributes.title: Recommended Books for You
attributes.description: A curated collection of must-read books across various genres
